metadata.title: Better Grillin BBQ Bastin Mop Basting Barbecue Brush/Mop Easily Applies Marinades, Sauces, Washes Out, 16in Handle, 6pk
features: Grilling can be fun and safe with this great accessory; Help the backyard chef add their favorite marinade, sauce, glaze or cooking oil to their meats and veggies as they cook on the grill
The Mop head is unique in size- can completely cover any cut of meat with your desired amount of sauce as it cooks; 16-inch wooden handle keeps your hands away from the heat and far from the flames
Better Grillin BBQ Mop head is made entirely of cotton, washes out easily with soap & water; Easy basting mop -one of several useful bbq accessories that are a great addition to your grilling tools
The Mop can be reusable by washing or can be disposable, depending on your needs; Bastin Mop Handle is made from quality wood and the mop head is durable, washable cotton
Birthday, Christmas, or Fathers Day call for the gift of barbeque tools - BBQ Bastin Mop is the perfect solution in Grilling gifts for Dad, always a welcome present for any time or special occasion
description: You don't have to deal with the heat and a big mess at your grill when you use The Better Grilin' BBQ Bastin Mop. The BBQ mopâ€™s extra long handle lets you slather on your favorite sauce or marinade while grilling or broiling without getting your arms too close to the heat. Convenient for family barbecues, cookouts, and picnics in the park, the barbecue mop is not high maintenance, easily washed with soap and water. With 2 or more mops per package, you can save one for at-home barbecues and easily dispose of the other barbecue mop when away from home rather than try to store and transport a messy mop back with you.Those yummy sauces, marinades, and glaze that are added to food on the backyard grill give food the best flavor as the chargrilled taste sets in over the fire. The Bastin Mop delivers an even coating on your food without burning your hands or arm as you apply the saucy finishing touches, making it the best grill brush. Unleash your inner chef grill master with a little help from the Barbecue Bastin Mop from Better Grillin.

title: Bastin' Mop Gets the Sauce On Without Hands in the Flames
